page.title: 12BUNCE'S BREWERY.
page.content: { Wiltshire's youngest brewery}was opened{one year ago}at the{Old Mill in{Netheravon. The malt is put into a machine which crushes it, then hot water is added and it is left. They sieve the malt out and put in hops to add flavour, these are then removed and yeast is put in. The yeast makes the froth on the top of the beer. No special ingredients are added to the brew. The beer is called {Bunce's Best Bitter and the brewery produces{144 gallons at each brewing, usually once a week. Some people go to the brewery to buy beer but usually it is taken round in the brewery truck. It is not sold through shop trade.
